metadata.title: CVE-2022-2719 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In ImageMagick, a crafted file could trigger an assertion failure when acall to WriteImages was made in MagickWand/operation.c, due to a NULL imagelist. This could potentially cause a denial of service. This was fixed inupstream ImageMagick version 7.1.0-30.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
